bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of persons believing to see their own physical appearance. Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 人自覺自 形作兩人，並臥，不別真假。不語，問亦無對。乃是離魂 , “If someone believes he and his physical appearance are two persons, who lie down side by side, and if he is unable to distinguish between real and false, does not speak, and when asked fails to answer, this is a case of hun -soul departure ”.
